name: Harvest Of Shadows - Lovecraft Gaming
description:
GAME OVERVIEW

Harvest of Shadow is a horror RPG with storytelling elements, inspired by H.P Lovecraft’s works, the game is an original addition to Cthulhu's mythology. It contains an innovative approach to the psychological terror created by Lovecraft in your works, and we bring these aspects into the immersive gameplay with a Young English Worker that’s surprised by the death notice of his uncle, a recluse scholar, And this young man will discover the secrets of his uncle’s past, in his mansion. 

THE STORY

During the Victorian Age, a Young English Worker that’s surprised by the death notice of his uncle, a recluse scholar, And this young man will discover the secrets of his uncle’s past. And even more surprising: the testament turn the young man into the heir of a fortune and become the mansion owner. Once rich and living in his late uncle’s grand house, this young man will discover that this mansion hides secrets that involve mysteries of a memorable past… and of unimaginable things. There is something terribly wrong inhabiting this house, and the heir must find out what it is.

FEATURES 

  • Cosmic Horror Ambience and colors created by pixel art.
  • Fluid Narrative that’s influenced by your choices and picks. 
  • Immersive music Ambience through to soundtracks.
  • Hand drawing inspired by Lovecraft’s history.
  • Choices in the first chapter will create more versions of dialogues and reputations of the characters.
  • Crafting Alchemy Mechanics.
  • Light Mechanics with fog and lantern.
  • Amazing Mini-Games and Puzzles.
